verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord You are good and Your mercy endureth forever
Lord You are good and Your mercy endureth forever
People from every nation and tongue
From generation to generation

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We worship You
Hallelujah, Hallejuah
We worship You
For who You are
We worship You
Hallelujah, Hallejuah
We worship You
For who You are
And You are good!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are good,
All the time!
And all the time,
You are good!
